comment: Took her online class and actually ended up doing okay. It's very frustrating because her first 3 quizzes are so hard they really hurt your grade from the very beginning. Then randomly, all of her quizzes become easy A's but your grade is still hurting from the 1st ones. Offers extra credit every module for 2 points each. SLOWEST grader ever.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--EXTRA CREDIT--Tests are tough

comment: Dr. Venell is a brilliant professor who is passionate, hard-working and knowledgeable about the subjects that she teaches in. Taking this class on Feminist Science Theory with her has opened my eyes to a whole knew field of study I hadn't previously considered. Everyone interested in gender and women's studies should take a class with Dr. Venell.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Clear grading criteria--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: I loved her class. It was a small class, so we all sort of got to know one another. It's probably the only class that I looked forward to, because she had us all participate in our controversial discussions. These discussions made the content more intriguing, and much easier to learn.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Inspirational--BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES

comment: She was interesting to listen to sometimes. I didn't get any of the books required but I somehow got 2 A's and a B on all 3 essays, so its definitely doable to not do the readings and get a decent grade. She gives random in class discussions that are kinda hard. Overall I'd take her again but you kinda gotta give some effort with her.
rating_tags: BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES--SO MANY PAPERS--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: Have no idea what will be going on in this class. All you do is read a whole bunch of different books throughout the semester. Barely have to go to class to pass. Only have 3 papers and final presentation. Doesn't really teach the subject well.
There's a lot of reading in the class.  The class discussions are great, so if you don't do the readings you will be lost.  Takes a while to grade papers, but would definitely take her again!

So, she is a great professor and there are no tests in her classes. Her classes are pretty easy, but she will stress you out by not grading assignments until the end of the year. She made class interesting, and I would recommend her. She's funny too.

This is really not a hard class. There are no test. Weekly discussion boards. There is a lot of reading. She takes a long time to grade your work. If you email her, she takes a while to reply. Overall the class is very interesting. Had a lot of good in class discussions. At times I thought to myself that this class could have been taken online.

I dropped this class, I thought it would be fun and easy. I should have taken it with the professor i originally wanted to take it with but due to schedule i couldn't.  TOOO MUCH WORK!!!! Its not hard but if your taking a lot of classes and have a lot of reading then this will be another load.

I took her for Queer Theory in Spring 2015. All of the reading are PDFs on D2L, so there's no textbook. The class is very interesting and she does a great job of keeping you interested in the subject. Queer theory is kind of a nebulous subject matter, but she is very passionate about it and willing to help. She's very nice and quirky.
